The fit of the sleeves is perfect at least. My biggest issue though, is the neck is 16.5 inches on a size small. I'm a 15 34/35 dress shirt and this looks ridiculous. I could gain another 75 lbs before the neck is too tight. I saw the neck was listed as 16.7 in the size chart and I assumed it was measured wrong, like 99% of other shirts are. No, this was accurate. The neck is massive.

类型: Special Size: Slim Fit Dress Shirts for MenSize: MediumColor: All White
评论详情: This men’s white dress shirt is a true wardrobe essential! The quality is outstanding, with a crisp and clean look that stays sharp all day long. The fabric is soft and breathable, providing great comfort even during long hours of wear.  The fit is perfect, tailored just right to provide a sleek, polished appearance without feeling too tight or restrictive. It’s versatile enough to pair with a suit for formal occasions or dress down with jeans for a more casual yet sophisticated look.  The craftsmanship is evident in the details. The stitching is impeccable, and the buttons are securely attached. It’s also easy to care for, with minimal wrinkling after washing, which is a huge plus for my busy lifestyle.  If you’re looking for a reliable and stylish white dress shirt, this one is a fantastic choice. It combines elegance, comfort, and durability, making it a top pick for any man’s wardrobe. Highly recommended!

类型: Special Size: Slim Fit Dress Shirts for MenSize: MediumColor: All White
评论详情: The shirt arrived fast. The color is really nice for a white shirt, and it has some sheer. The material is light weight but the shirt is not “see through”. Although the label reads “slim fit”, it is not. It fits like a regular M or even a relaxed M. The sleeves are wide and the stitching not careful. Check for defects in the stitching. My thoughts: If you are really slim all over, have a rather slender frame and are used to fitting like a glove in other “slim fit shirts” size M, this one might not be what you are looking for. However, it has a nice fabric, very roomy, super relaxed fit and it does not feel hot while wearing it on a hot day.
